title: After game
body: Hello everyone. After i have played a game and press continue it always take me about 1 min. to get out of it, and i have tryed to uninstall and install it again but it dosen't seem to work. Does anyone know how to fix it?

replies.body: You might have the option "close client during game" turned on in the client settings, which will make it take a little while for the client to reopen after games. Check that really quick and turn it off if it's checked and test it in a custom or practice game to see how much faster it loads.
